name: Bug Off
description:
You are working on your game, try to fill the progress bar before the deadline bar is full

Your progress gets slowed down by the nasty bugs that attack you, don't let them trough!

You can press or hold the space bar to shoot debugging code

Your progress won't fill up while shooting, so time your shots delicately!

You can let the bugs with special powerups trough, they will help you!

Have fun!
